name: v2 Filler status codes
description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0278 ( Filler status codes)

concept.display: The indicated time slot(s) is(are) blocked
The indicated appointment was stopped from occurring (canceled prior to starting)

designation.value: De aangegeven afspraak is gestopt voordat deze actief werd (geannuleerd vóór starten)

concept.display: The indicated appointment has completed normally (was not discontinued, canceled, or deleted)

designation.value: De aangegeven afspraak is normaal voltooid (niet afgebroken, geannuleerd of verwijderd)

concept.display: The indicated appointment was discontinued (DC’ed while in progress, discontinued parent appointment, or discontinued child appointment)

designation.value: De aangegeven afspraak is afgebroken (afgebroken terwijl deze gaande was, afgebroken bovenliggende afspraak, of afgebroken onderliggende afspraak)

concept.display: The indicated appointment was deleted from the filler application

designation.value: De aangegeven afspraak is verwijderd van de filler applicatie

concept.display: The patient did not show up for the appointment

designation.value: De patiënt is niet verschenen bij de afspraak

concept.display: The appointment has been confirmed; however it is confirmed in an overbooked state

designation.value: De aangegeven afspraak is bevestigd; het is echter tevens in overboekte status

concept.display: Appointment has not yet been confirmed
The indicated appointment has begun and is currently in progress

designation.value: De aangegeven afspraak is begonnen en is momenteel bezig

concept.display: Appointment has been placed on a waiting list for a particular slot, or set of slots

designation.value: De afspraak is op een wachtlijst gezet voor een bepaald afspraakposities, of set van afspraakposities
